name: connect(_:to:fromBus:toBus:format:)
desc: Establishes a connection between two nodes, specifying the input and output busses.
declaration:
func connect(_ node1: AVAudioNode, 
          to node2: AVAudioNode, 
     fromBus bus1: AVAudioNodeBus, 
       toBus bus2: AVAudioNodeBus, 
      format: AVAudioFormat?)
